fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegame

Class ActiveGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegame.ActiveGame

  • public class ActiveGame
extends Object
    ActiveGame is the game that is currently played.
    Author:
    iah1016

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActiveGame

        public ActiveGame(Random random,
                  Map<String,Integer> configIntValues,
                  List<Villager> villagers,
                  Player player,
                  Sect sect)
        All the objects given as parameters will be permanently attached to this ActiveGame object.
        Parameters:
        random - Random is created by the Main class.
        configIntValues - The variable values for all the logic modules attached to this ActiveGame.
        villagers - The List of villagers.
        player - The player of the active game.
        sect - The player's sect.

      • getGameEndingCondition

        public int getGameEndingCondition()
        The conditions are: [0] the game has not ended, [1] the maximum amount of turns has been reached, [2] the death cult ending, [3] the paradise island ending.
        Returns:
        Returns the ending condition.
